title: FanDuel Promo Code: Win $150 Bonus on Any NFL or College Football Game
text: Sports Betting Dime provides exclusive sports betting commercial content to Newsweek, including real-time odds, picks, analysis and premier sportsbook offers to help sports fans get in on the action. Please wager responsibly. There are plenty of college football bowl games and [NFL](https://www.newsweek.com/topic/nfl) matchups, making it a great time to unlock the latest FanDuel promo code offer. [Sign up with our FanDuel promo code links](https://actionrush.com/go/newsweek-fanduel/) to activate a 30-1 money line boost for the game of your choice. After unlocking the current FanDuel promo code offer, new customers need to place a $5 money line wager on any game. If it wins, you'll get $150 in bonus bets. The odds of your first wager don't matter, so try betting on a big favorite. Taking the Browns to beat the Jets on Thursday night is a great option. Cleveland is a 7.5-point favorite at home against New York. As a customer, you will have access to other NFL bonuses on the FanDuel app. For example, customers can use a 25% live boost during the game. [Sign up for this FanDuel promo code offer](https://actionrush.com/go/newsweek-fanduel/) and make a $5 money line bet on any NFL or college football game. A win will result in $150 of bonus bets. Unlock the FanDuel Promo Code Offer for TNF |FanDuel Promo Code||Register Through Our Links to Activate| |Welcome Offer||Bet $5, Win $150 on Any Game| |Last Confirmed||December 28, 2023| |Verified By||Russell Joy, Sports Betting Dime| The Browns are going to be a tough out in the playoffs. Joe Flacco has been playing great, so I don't see them having any trouble with the Jets on Thursday night. Trevor Siemian will start at QB for New York since Zach Wilson is out. If you win this wager on the Browns game, you will have $150 in bonus bets to use for the Lions vs. Cowboys on Saturday night. Remember, there aren't any games on Monday for Week 17, making it a packed slate on Sunday. Steps to Activate the Best FanDuel Promo Code Offer Take these steps to activate the top FanDuel promo code offer. New customers in eligible states can start with this boost. |FanDuel Promo Code|[Sign up for an account](https://actionrush.com/go/newsweek-fanduel/)to unlock this FanDuel promo code offer - Enter your full legal name, physical address, phone number and birthdate to confirm your identity - Provide an email and create a password - Download the FanDuel Sportsbook app on your iPhone or Android and allow for location services - Select a deposit method, such as PayPal or a credit/debit card - Make a $10+ deposit - Bet $5 or more on any NFL or college football game A winning wager will result in $150 of bonus bets. You can use these throughout the weekend, in addition to other bonuses and free contests on the FanDuel app. Bet on Any College Football Bowl Games Get ready for the CFP by betting on the bowl games this week. Here are the four games on Thursday. - Wasabi Fenway Bowl: SMU vs. Boston College - Bad Boy Mowers Pinstripe Bowl: Rutgers vs. Miami - Pop-Tarts Bowl: NC State vs. Kansas State - Valero Alamo Bowl: Arizona vs. Oklahoma We have another three matchups on Friday, including the Fighting Irish in El Paso, Texas. - TaxSlayer Gator Bowl: Clemson vs. Kentucky - Tony the Tiger Sun Bowl: Oregon State vs. Notre Dame - AutoZone Liberty Bowl: Memphis vs. Iowa State [Sign up for the latest FanDuel promo code offer](https://actionrush.com/go/newsweek-fanduel/) and make a $5 wager on any football team to win. A winning wager will result in a $150 bonus. Newsweek may earn an affiliate commission if you sign up through the links in this article.
